title: Ryannology Mens Linen Shirts Casual Cotton 3/4 Sleeve Regular-Fit Henley T-Shirt Summer Lightweight Beach Yoga Tops
description: MATERIAL -- Made with cotton and linen, lightweight, and breathable, giving you maximum comfort all day long.
FEATURE -- Regular-Fit style, four-button henley placket, solid color, one chest pocket, 3/4 long sleeve. Simple design will not go out of style.
SUITABLE FOR -- Fresh and comfortable, perfect for all Casual, Leisure, Sports, It's crisp enough for workdays, and comfortable enough for weekends. Perfect gift for families, friends or boyfriend!
CLOTHING MATCH -- These 3/4 sleeve stylish shirts could be easy to match with dress pants, slacks, chinos, and jeans.
